00293     \textcolor{keyword}{def }\hyperlink{classCourse_1_1CourseUnit_1_1PersCourse_a6e682e872daa8d3523015e1b4df76d0f}{fetch}(self, id, db):
00294         model\_data = db.objects.filter(identity=id)
00295         format\_data = \{\}
00296 
00297         \textcolor{comment}{## @for}
00298         \textcolor{comment}{#   Cria um dicionário de listas, no fomato:}
00299         \textcolor{comment}{#}
00300         \textcolor{comment}{#   CAMPO\_NO\_BANCO\_DE\_DADOS => [ VALOR\_1, VALOR\_2 ... VALOR\_N ]}
00301         \textcolor{keywordflow}{for} i \textcolor{keywordflow}{in} model\_data.values():
00302             format\_data[i[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'field'}]]=format\_data.get(i[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'field'}],[])+[i[\textcolor{stringliteral}{'value'}]]
00303 
00304         \textcolor{keywordflow}{return} format\_data
